AOverthink.title: Overthink
AOverthink.desc: Discard a <c=card>Ponder</c> in hand, or in the draw pile.

BlueFragment.name: Blue Fragment
BlueFragment.playerDesc: Gain 1 <c=status>HALF SHIELD</c> when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.
BlueFragment.enemyDesc: Gain 1 <c=status>HALF SHIELD</c> when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.

RedFragment.name: Red Fragment
RedFragment.playerDesc: This <c=part>part</c> <c=action>attacks</c> for 0 and applies <c=status>HALF DAMAGE</c> at the end of every turn.
RedFragment.enemyDesc: This <c=part>part</c> <c=action>attacks</c> for 1 at the end of every turn.

GreenFragment.name: Green Fragment
GreenFragment.playerDesc: When this <c=part>part</c> is shot gain 1 <c=status>HALF HEAL</c>.
GreenFragment.enemyDesc: When this <c=part>part</c> is shot gain 1 <c=status>HALF HEAL</c>.

YellowFragment.name: Yellow Fragment
YellowFragment.playerDesc: Gain 1 <c=status>HALF EVADE</c> at the end of every turn.
YellowFragment.enemyDesc: This ship moves 1 space toward you when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.

MagentaFragment.name: Magenta Fragment
MagentaFragment.playerDesc: Gain 1 <c=status>HALF TEMP SHIELD</c> at the start of every turn.
MagentaFragment.enemyDesc: Gain 1 <c=status>HALF TEMP SHIELD</c> at the start of every turn.

CyanFragment.name: Cyan Fragment
CyanFragment.playerDesc: The enemy gains 3 <c=status>OXIDATION</c> when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.
CyanFragment.enemyDesc: You gain 1 <c=status>OXIDATION</c> when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.

OrangeFragment.name: Orange Fragment
OrangeFragment.playerDesc: The enemy gains 3 <c=status>HEAT</c> when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.
OrangeFragment.enemyDesc: You gain 1 <c=status>HEAT</c> when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.

GB.name: BG
GB.playerDesc: When this <c=part>part</c> takes hull damage gain 1 <c=hull>max hull</c> and heal 1 <c=hull>.
GB.enemyDesc: When this <c=part>part</c> takes hull damage gain 1 <c=hull>max hull</c> and heal 1 <c=hull>.

BY.name: BY
BY.playerDesc: When this <c=part>part</c> <c=action>attacks</c> gain 1 <c=status>HALF SHIELD</c> and 1 <c=status>HALF EVADE</c>.
BY.enemyDesc: When this <c=part>part</c> <c=action>attacks</c> gain 1 <c=status>HALF SHIELD</c> and 1 <c=status>HALF EVADE</c>.

BM.name: BM
BM.playerDesc: At the start of combat gain 1 <c=status>PERFECT SHIELD</c>.
BM.enemyDesc: At the start of combat gain 1 <c=status>PERFECT SHIELD</c>.

BO.name: BO
BO.playerDesc: Gain 2 <c=status>SERENITY</c> at the start of every turn.
BO.enemyDesc: Gain 2 <c=status>SERENITY</c> at the start of every turn.

RG.name: RG
RG.playerDesc: When <c=action>attacks</c> from this <c=part>part</c> deal <c=hull>hull</c> damage they deal 2 more.
RG.enemyDesc: When <c=action>attacks</c> from this <c=part>part</c> deal <c=hull>hull</c> damage they deal 2 more.

RY.name: RY
RY.playerDesc: This <c=part>part</c> <c=action>attacks</c> for 0 and applies <c=status>HALF DAMAGE</c> when this ship moves.
RY.enemyDesc: This <c=part>part</c> <c=action>attacks</c> for 0 and applies <c=status>HALF DAMAGE</c> when this ship moves.

RM.name: RM
RM.playerDesc: At the start of every turn gain 1 <c=status>FLUX</c>.
RM.enemyDesc: At the start of every turn gain 1 <c=status>FLUX</c>.

RC.name: RC
RC.playerDesc: When <c=action>attacks</c> from this <c=part>part</c> deal damage they give 3 <c=status>OXIDATION</c>.
RC.enemyDesc: When <c=action>attacks</c> from this <c=part>part</c> deal damage they give 3 <c=status>OXIDATION</c>.

RO.name: RO
RO.playerDesc: When <c=action>attacks</c> from this <c=part>part</c> deal damage they give 3 <c=status>HEAT</c>.
RO.enemyDesc: When <c=action>attacks</c> from this <c=part>part</c> deal damage they give 3 <c=status>HEAT</c>.

GY.name: GY
GY.playerDesc: Gain 1 <c=status>QUARTER HEAL</c> when this ship moves.
GY.enemyDesc: Gain 1 <c=status>QUARTER HEAL</c> when this ship moves.

GM.name: GM
GM.playerDesc: Gain 1 <c=status>QUARTER HEAL</c> and 5 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.
GM.enemyDesc: Gain 1 <c=status>QUARTER HEAL</c> and 5 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.

CG.name: GC
CG.playerDesc: Set <c=status>OXIDATION</c> to 0 and lose 1 <c=status>CORRODE</c> when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.
CG.enemyDesc: Set <c=status>OXIDATION</c> to 0 and lose 1 <c=status>CORRODE</c> when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.

GO.name: GO
GO.playerDesc: Set <c=status>HEAT</c> to 0 and gain 1 <c=status>SERENITY</c> when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.
GO.enemyDesc: Set <c=status>HEAT</c> to 0 and gain 1 <c=status>SERENITY</c> when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.

YM.name: YM
YM.playerDesc: Gain 3 <c=status>EVADE</c> and 5 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> when this <c=part>part</c> takes <c=hull>hull</c> damage.
YM.enemyDesc: Gain 5 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> and <c=status>ENGINE LOCK</c> you when this <c=part>part</c> takes <c=hull>hull</c> damage.

YC.name: YC
YC.playerDesc: When the other ship moves it gains 1 <c=status>OXIDATION</c>.
YC.enemyDesc: When the other ship moves it gains 1 <c=status>OXIDATION</c>.

YO.name: YO
YO.playerDesc: Gain 2 <c=status>EVADE</c> and 2 <c=status>HEAT</c> at the start of every turn.
YO.enemyDesc: The other ship gains 1 <c=status>ENGINE STALL</c> at the start of each of it's turns.

MC.name: MC
MC.playerDesc: When <c=part>part</c> is shot while this ship has <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> the other ship gains 4 <c=status>OXIDATION</c>.
MC.enemyDesc: When <c=part>part</c> is shot while this ship has <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> the other ship gains 4 <c=status>OXIDATION</c>.

MO.name: MO
MO.playerDesc: When this ship <c=action>OVERHEATS</c> it gains 5 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.
MO.enemyDesc: When this ship <c=action>OVERHEATS</c> it gains 5 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c>.

CO.name: CO
CO.playerDesc: Deal 1 <c=hull>hull</c> damage to the other ship when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.
CO.enemyDesc: Deal 1 <c=hull>hull</c> damage to the other ship when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.

YY.name: YY
YY.playerDesc: Gain 1 <c=status>AUTODODGE RIGHT</c> at the start of every turn.
YY.enemyDesc: Gain 1 <c=status>AUTODODGE RIGHT</c> at the start of every turn.

MM.name: MM
MM.playerDesc: When this <c=part>part</c> is shot every <c=part>part</c> gains <c=parttrait>armor</c> until the next turn.
MM.enemyDesc: When this <c=part>part</c> is shot every <c=part>part</c> gains <c=parttrait>armor</c> until the next turn.

CC.name: CC
CC.playerDesc: The other ship gains 3 <c=status>OXIDATION</c> when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.
CC.enemyDesc: The other ship gains 5 <c=status>OXIDATION</c> when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.

OO.name: OO
OO.playerDesc: Deal 2 damage to the other ship when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.
OO.enemyDesc: Deal 2 damage to the other ship when this <c=part>part</c> is shot.

fragmentReward.title: TAKE SOME FRAGMENTS
fragmentReward.info:
Fragments are attached to ship parts and empower your capabilities.
You can have up to 4 on a part.

dialogue.FragmentSequence: CRYSTAL FRAGMENTATION DETECTED!!! >>> PLEASE SELECT BOOT OPTION
